properties.name: Edward's Tobacco Shop, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Bootlegbonvivant  E 3439 S. Broadway Englewood, CO 80113(303) 781 7662 Toll free: 888 781 7662 Edward’s is an old-fashioned tobacco shop (complete with wooden Indian) with a great selection of pipes, tobaccos, and cigars, as well as great company. Sit at the bar and shoot the breeze or watch movies in the back while you smoke your favorite pipe blend or cigar. The staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and colorful.

properties.name: Smitty's Cigar & Tobacco
properties.description: Posted by BootlegbonvivantLocated at: 975 Dawsonville Hwy, Gainesville, GA 30501 A wonderful tobacco store, selling cigars, pipes, and tobacco of all types. He allows patrons to smoke their cigars and pipes right there while enjoying some television or a magazine. Smitty is full of knowledge and extremely helpful to his customers. Many customers are regulars and have known Smitty for many years.

properties.name: Smoker's Embassy Fine Cigars
properties.description: Posted by Bootlegbonvivant2085 Hamilton Creek Parkway, #126, Dacula, GA 30019 Right around the corner from Hamilton Mill Golf Club and in the same place as the Starbucks, these guys are mostly knowledgeable in cigars. The pipes they sell are mostly all Peterson, with the exception of some meerschaum pipes. They are nice and professional with, I do believe a small smoking room in the back.

properties.name: Smoker's Embassy Fine Cigars
properties.description: Posted by BootlegbonvivantLocated at: 2085 Hamilton Creek Parkway, #126, Dacula, GA 30019 These guys are mostly knowledgeable in cigars, but they do sell pipes and pipe tobacco. Pipes are mostly all Peterson and some meerschaums.

properties.name: Smokers' Haven
properties.description: Posted by Bootlegbonvivant2475 N. High St.Local- (614)-299-2442 Toll Free- (866)-SMHAVEN Toll Free- (866)-764-2836 I\'ve gone to their site countless times and never realized they have a physical location in Ohio. I recently found a picture of the inside of Smokers\' Haven circa 1982. If this place looks similar to what it did back then, this place is MASSIVE. I\'d love to stop by their store sometime.
